content:
Can anyone help me with this?
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179255-questionnaire/topic/Questionnaire/near/222184939

I followed the documentation https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/docs/model/profiles_and_extensions.html (2.3.4Custom Resource Types) which explains adding additional fields at Resource level. But I would like to add additional field to an item[] in a Questionnaire Resource.
